items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A potion that heals you for 20 health points.

items.name: Strong Health Potion
items.description: A potion that heals you for 35 health points.

items.name: Damage Elixir
items.description: A potion that increases your damage by 5 points.
items.price: It's free if you ask nicely

items.name: Power Elixir
items.description: A potion that increases your damage by 10 points.
items.price: It's free if you can dance

items.name: Epic Health Potion
items.description: An epic potion that heals you for 50 health points.
items.price: It's free if you can do 2+2

items.name: Epic Damage Elixir
items.description: An epic potion that increases your damage by 20 points.
items.price: It's free if you can do 2*2

items.name: Legendary Health Potion
items.description: A legendary potion that fully restores your health.
items.price: It's free if you can do 2^2

items.name: Legendary Damage Elixir
items.description: A legendary potion that greatly increases your damage by 50 points.
items.price: It's free if you can do 2^3
